Posts.Content: indiangirl2012 wrote: i have 13 years old fibroadenoma in my right breast. i am 31 years old. from last year i am going to yearly mammogram. last month went for mammogram. same day got a call from the lab that they need to take additional mammo and US. mammo didnt find anything but it mentioned about my old fibroadenoma. in us they found the same old fibroadenoma also at 12'o clock they found one .42x.46x.5 cm nodule with somewhat irregular margins.it is indeterminate. last week thursday had a ultrasound guided core biopsy. the dr took one sample and after that he couldnt found the nodule but he follwed the needle track and took 2 samples. after that he tried to locate the nodule. but he couldnt find it. they didnt deploy the titanium marker(they didnt know where the nodule was). and they didnt take mammogram after that. dr said it might be a cyst. but he was sure that he took one sample from the nodule. today or tomorrow i will get the biopsy result. scared....:( Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: the nodule disappeared during the core biopsy indiangirl2012 indiangirl2012
